objectives: To design, develop, launch and orbit a spacecraft around the Moon using an Indian-made launch vehicle.

To conduct scientific experiments using instruments on the spacecraft which would yield data for the preparation of a three-dimensional atlas of the near and far side of the Moon and for chemical and mineralogical mapping of the entire lunar surface.

payloads.name: Moon Impact Probe (MIP)
payloads.purpose: To impact the lunar surface to test landing technologies and analyze the thin lunar atmosphere.

outcome.summary: Chandrayaan-1 was instrumental in the discovery of water molecules on the Moon. The mission was concluded prematurely after communication with the spacecraft was lost.
